comment: Works with Maple JB Player! (except for song info) This is the only Wear music controller I know of that will control Maple JB Player which is the best Android music player (Poweramp does not have playback speed control). Took off one star because you have to swipe left to get to the playback controls. I want the playback controls to appear first without swiping left.

author: David Rager
comment: Totally worth spending a couple bucks for an app that fixes the voice control problem.  However, this app only seems to partially fix it (maybe I 'm missing something though).  I'm trying to leave my watch in a "listening mode", such that I can just say "play", "pause", "ok google play", "ok google pause", or some other phrase that allows me to start/pause my music app (google play music in this case).  The mic button kind of works, but I first have to press the mic button and secondly I have to confirm that what I said is indeed what I meant.  Any hints? :)

author: Anton Frolov
comment: No shuffle option? Thanks for the app tho

author: David Scott
comment: Only a trial, yea, like I'm gonna pay for this, lol

author: Victor Ruskovoloshin
comment: Good start and pretty good set of features but not yet finished. Doesn't really work with Android Wear 2. I tried Media Monkey and Player Pro, it works sporadically but mostly doesn't. Hope you fix it soon, would be really happy to change my review and actually use the app. Good luck.

reply.author: Barkside Apps
reply.content: Android Wear 2.0 fixes are now live

author: clive rennison
comment: editing my previous review as I have managed to get it working again with BlackPlayer ex. However it can be very temperamental, when I try to start my music straight from my watch it will play, but then after 1 or 2 seconds it stops and starts the stock player, i have to press the play/pause button 3 or 4 times to stop it and keep playing music on BlackPlayer. Other than that it works like it used to. It also seems to clash with the built in music control on my wear device? As in I have 2 controls on watch

reply.author: Barkside Apps
reply.content: Well nothing has changed here. Perhaps settings of Black Player have been reset? Try reinstalling. Thanks

title: Best option out there but still not there 4.5*

author: Matthew Waggoner
comment: Does not work with any of my music apps, reset my watch and phone several times to get it to work, nothing doing. Don't waste your time or money.
title: Terrible app

author: tj pearson
comment: HTC ONE M8s - Player Pro - LG Urbane - Bluedio Bluetooth Headphones. Set up is easy and it worked flawlessly, now will be able to lounge about on holiday, phone playing music tucked under sun lounger, headphones on and controlling everything from my watch using my sweaty fingers 😃 🌞
title: Worked with:

author: Divij Singh
comment: Great app, just needs some work on making it less buggy and maybe giving a song list option.

reply.author: Barkside Apps
reply.content: Song list option is provided in Google Play Music. Others music apps don't expose this functionality unfortunately.

title: Very happy, could use some fixes though

comment: Please put volume control on same screen as skip tracks. 1st screen when swiped. Paid and works great with iHeartradio and Samsung music

author: Glenn Wakefield
comment: Keeps giving me an error message with all music applications.
title: Doesn't work

author: Jeff Sebestyen
comment: I am strictly looking to have the Volume buttons and Next Track button on the same screen.  I give props to this app though.
title: Seems neat at best. I need more customizability.

author: tony sun
comment: It works mostly well, but I dunno if it's the newest update on my wear or something, whenever I try to launch my Google Play music playlist, it launches another playlist instead, instead of my personal playlist. Other else than that it works well.

author: Manish Manohar
comment: Doesn't work with Android wear 2

reply.author: Barkside Apps
reply.content: Android Wear 2.0 fixes are now live. Sorry for the delay

author: dan Bdan
comment: just want quick access to skip forward action for spotify
title: ok but

author: Aaron Shrum
comment: Works well with supported music players. Would gladly buy if support with rhapsody could be obtained.

reply.author: Barkside Apps
reply.content: Unfortunately, Rhapsody does not allow third-party apps to control it. Thanks for your feedback.

title: Will not work with rhapsody.

author: Jacob Nelson
comment: The trial period is literally zero seconds. Constant reminder telling you to upgrade.

reply.author: Barkside Apps
reply.content: Trial period is 4 days, hopefully long enough for anyone to work out whether it works?

title: Don't get this app

comment: When I'm watching a video on my phone, the wear app won't dismiss by itself after I close it on my phone and my battery on my watch drains fast

author: Tim Sweatt
comment: Worked as described. Controls my Pandora very well.

author: Eric G
comment: Not downloading to Moto 360 v2

author: Kritty Kriss
comment: Not work with Joox

author: Emmanuel Mariano
comment: works great on my lg g watch
title: works great

author: Aureliano Cilocilo
comment: nice apps

author: Kevin Roell
comment: Just downloaded and tested with amazon music. It looks great and works flawlessly. I really like the layout of the app. This is exactly what I was looking for. I will update with any changes I come across, good or bad, after I get more use out of the app.
title: Great at first glance!

author: Miguel Lopez
comment: Even when the music apps I use somewhat break the functionality of this app, the app continues to work by allowing me to at least pause/play and skip foreword/back.
title: Works well and does what I need it to do

author: Pranav Kumar
comment: This app is perfect, easy to use, nice UI. Work with Amazon music, Google music, Saavan, TuneIn. These four I have. Kudos to development team.
title: Perfect one

comment: This app has maybe potential but it's not even near to be asking money for it. It worked with Spotify but not Rocket Player or Audible. And Spotify support we don't really need since it's working pretty good in Android wear. So, it's so far a pretty useless app. Deleted!

reply.author: Barkside Apps
reply.content: Sorry you weren't happy with our app.  It has been reported to work in Rocket Player and Audible in the past. We will check again!

title: wanted so bad for it to work

author: France Rovelli
comment: got it mainly to start stitcher from my watch while driving.  it launches the app on my phone, but neither vocally nor by tapping play will it start a podcast.  i just keep getting a pop up message on the phone saying "wear music controller:  an error has occured." other music apps start ok.  disappointed :(  in that case i'm switching to podcast addict which seems a bit more wear-friendly.  giving it a test run for now...

reply.author: Barkside Apps
reply.content: It looks like Stitcher doesn't support standard Android Media interfaces - therefore it won't work with this app unfortunately. Sorry

author: Sebastian Safari
comment: I needed an app to control Pandora so that I can like and dislike songs, and change stations. This does that in a beautiful way.
title: Wear needed a better media system, this delivers

author: Miroslav Vitula
comment: Love the list view of all songs. But buttons always reload and the app is very slow. Needs to stick in memory when music is playing
title: It's OK

author: Ramey Kanally
comment: Error occurred Galaxy Note 4 and Asus ZenWatch. Have to thank Pandora for even needing an App like this after they removed Wear controls
title: No worky

author: anthonyprieto09
comment: Loved it worth buying only app I've paid for in a while nice feel to my watch(moto360) little glitch with pause/play button the icons over lap just animation still pauses plays well
title: Wow

author: Paul Johnson
comment: Would be great if when waking watch screen it could go straight to this app. Would it be possible to add a watch face, with media control toggles on it?  Thanks for the great app!
title: Best media control app

author: Ike Amobi
comment: Has been very unreliable and only partially communicates with phone when screen is on. Otherwise often doesn't do anything with the screen off
title: This version

author: Isaac Chan
comment: I hate the music controls that are native to Android wear. This fixes all my problems with it.
title: This saved the moto 360 for me

author: Ryan Ansari
comment: At first I was skeptical but after trying it a bit this was exactly what I was looking for a great job by the developers works very well with my moto 360 and one plus combo
title: Wow

author: Soniboy84
comment: Spotify doesn't start. It says: an error had occurred.
title: Doesn't work

author: Breana Blackman
comment: When I pause a song from SoundCloud and then go to play it. It starts playing music from the music player and not SoundCloud please fix
title: Auto Plays

author: Will Varley
comment: I'd gladly pay the $2 if it worked with pandora

reply.author: Barkside Apps
reply.content: Yes there is no Pandora control, as specified in the description - we have no control over this situation - sorry you felt a one star review was required...

title: No Pandora control.

author: MyKe Acuña
comment: Doesn't work on note 4 with zenwatch.
